articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Moscow bombs Odesa after Ukraine destroys Russian warship in Crimea - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian forces also targeted a Russian ammo depot in the occupied Donetsk region Sunday evening.
articles.content:
KYIV Russia bombed the Odesa region on Sunday, damaging an art museum and warehouses, a day after Ukrainian forces struck a Russian missile carrier at a Kerch shipyard. 
A Russian Kalibr missile car… [+1896 chars]
